item.title: Comment on Marc Andreessen on Atlas Shrugged by ElsieT
item.description:
I laughed out loud when Andreessen waxed lyrical about the "fantastic" quality of the Trump appointees. Hegspeth, Kennedy, Gabbard, Lake, and others? You've got to be kidding. This is a team of sociopaths.
